attributes.action: Taxes to Charity: The £ Percentage Promise.
attributes.additional_details:
It is perhaps the oldest and most respected ideal to follow, give to the poor. However, knowing specifically how much tax from your pocket is donated remains a more difficult matter.

What we propose is a promise from her majesty's government to donate a percentage of each pound into your local council's charity schemes.

It is our fundamental goal as a society and as a human to flourish, this scheme aims to give that chance to all, by simply ensuring that a percentage of our £ given to the government is given back to those who need it first and foremost.
